thread.title: Carlos Tevez mobbed by fans after arriving in China as he’s set to earn £615,000-a-week, after it emerges Chinese government blocked a potential world record deal for star name

author: dfraser
title: Carlos Tevez mobbed by fans after arriving in China as he’s set to earn £615,000-a-week, after it emerges Chinese government blocked a potential world record deal for star name
text:
EFL Los in translation Carlos Tevez mobbed by fans after arriving in China as he’s set to earn £615,000-a-week, after it emerges Chinese government blocked a potential world record deal for star name 
Forward lands in Shanghai with hoards of supporters eager to catch a glimpse By Dave Fraser
